long_description: The Sony Action Cam tilt adapter lets you customize your Action Cam's point of view when used with the Action Cam waterproof case (Action Cam and waterproof case sold separately). Tilt adapter adjusts from 0deg to 105deg in 15deg increments. Simply attach the Sony Action Cam tilt adapter to any mount (sold separately) that has a tripod screw to create the flexibility you need to set up the perfect shot.
